title: Tri Level Loft with Parking included ~ J.Wavro
posting_body: ['San Francisco - South of Market - Condo for rent', 'Tri Level Loft with Parking included', 'Link to mobile layout: \xa0 <URL>', 'Summary:', 'Rent: $4795', 'Bed / Bath: 2 / 2.5', 'Type: Condo', 'Term: 12 Months', 'Please contact:', 'Shane Nugent \xa0 |', 'show contact info', '| \xa0 \xa0 <URL>', 'Description:', 'This large tri -level, light-filled loft is located on Russ and Folsom in the heart of Soma in a 10 unit, live work boutique building nestled in the vibrant SoMa neighborhood with trend-setting bars, restaurants, cafes and clubs as well as being 3 blocks from BART and MUNI, with convenient freeway access!', 'Loft Features', '~ Tri-level loft', '~ Floor to ceiling windows', '~ Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances - gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave', '~ Open planned kitchen flows into the main living space', '~ High ceilings allowowing an abundance of natural light to fill the unit', '~ Two Gas fireplaces', '~ Two large bedrooms', '~ 2.5 bathrooms with modern finishes', '~ 1 Parking space included in rent', '~ 1 storage space included in the rent', '~ Shared roof deck', '~ High Speed Wifi, Water and garbage included in the rent', '~ Pets will be considered', '~ Security deposit is 1.5 x the rentThis is a non-smoking unit.', 'Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.', 'Details:', 'Floors: Hardwood', 'Kitchen: Gourmet', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Outside area:', 'Parking: Garage', 'Parking Fee: $0', 'Pets:   Cat & Dog Negotiable    OK', 'View: Street', 'Location:', 'Russ Street & Folsom Street, San Francisco, California', 'Meet the J.Wavro Team:', '<URL>', 'Please contact:', 'Shane Nugent \xa0 |', 'show contact info', '| \xa0 \xa0 <URL>', 'Preview more properties at <URL>', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'Content and Images © 2003 - 2021 J.Wavro \xa0 | \xa0 BRE # 01810008 \xa0 | \xa0 cl31399092014910-0']
